key_player:
Arrow keys: move
Space or up key: jump
Left shift: attack
E: exit
P: pause
H: help
N: mute sound
M: mute music
S: statistics
Crtl+D: Devlopper mode
key_dev:
Crtl+D: Devlopper mode
D: debug
A: ask for level name
F: force load level
O: print the level in png
Q: quick object creation
dev_mode_note:
Informations

you're going to switch to devlopper mode please concider the folowing message :

You need to be in devlopper mode to use this key.
This mode is used to debug the game and create new levels and facilitate the development of the game.
This mode can be used to cheat and break the game. Please use it wisely.
To quit this mode, press ctrl+shift+d again.
To quit this page, press enter or escape.
